name: PEG SOLITAIRE
description:
Peg Solitaire is a game that is relaxing, and challenging all at the same time.

The rules are simple, you take one peg, and you jump over another peg in any direction as long as there is an empty hole to jump to.

The goal is to leave only a single peg left, sounds simple, but can be pretty complex.

Earn points by jumping pegs, and a big bonus more by winning the game.

Use earned points to unlock new boards and pegs!

Features


  • 2 Starter game boards, and 8 unlockable game boards.

  • 2 Starter pegs, and 8 unlockable pegs.

  • A randomized starter hole for repeatability of boards without constantly playing the same thing.
  • An option to randomize the peg and board used when playing continuously so as to not play the same board or use the same peg every round.
  • Encouraging words to keep you going through your losses.

To use controllers or the keyboard for playing the game you must tick the gamepad checkbox in the settings menu.
